name: TRUE AIO Multi-Bot (Python | Node | Bun)
author: custom
description: Run multiple bots/apps in one server with auto-detect, PM2, .env loader

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

apt update -y
apt install -y curl wget git python3 python3-pip

# Node.js
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_lts.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs
npm install -g pm2 yarn

# Bun
curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash

# AIO MULTI BOT LAUNCHER
cat << 'EOF' > aio.sh
#!/bin/bash
export PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"

# Load global .env
if [ -f .env ]; then
  export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs)
  echo "ðŸ” Global .env loaded"
fi

pm2 delete all >/dev/null 2>&1

start_bot() {
  NAME=$1
  CMD=$2
  echo "ðŸš€ Starting $NAME"
  pm2 start $CMD --name $NAME
}

# Scan folders
for dir in bots/*; do
  [ -d "$dir" ] || continue
  cd "$dir"

  # Load per-bot env
  if [ -f .env ]; then
    export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs)
    echo "ðŸ” $dir .env loaded"
  fi

  if [ -f main.py ]; then
    start_bot "$(basename $dir)-python" "python3 main.py"

  elif [ -f index.js ]; then
    start_bot "$(basename $dir)-node" "node index.js"

  elif [ -f index.ts ]; then
    start_bot "$(basename $dir)-bun" "bun run index.ts"
  fi

  cd - >/dev/null
 done

pm2 save
pm2 logs
EOF

chmod +x aio.sh

echo "Multi-Bot AIO ready"
